name: Murloc RPG Classic
description:
The Murloc RPG Classic

Once a game doomed to never be fully finished now has new hopes.

NOTE: This game is still in dev and will be full with bugs! If you find one, post it on the reddit page (Link in game)

From an early age I loved this game and so have been charged to remake it, with plans to expand on what was left behind.

Planning to rebuild the first game, then build a second game taking into account the other games updated aesthetic and talent system
